reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 399/11: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF SIOUX NARROWS-NESTOR FALLS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — TOWNSHIP OF SIOUX NARROWS-NESTOR FALLS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 399/11: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF SIOUX NARROWS-NESTOR FALLS

content.content: 1. All authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision is delegated to the council of the Township of Sioux Narrows-Nestor Falls with respect to all applications for land in that municipality made on or after this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 399/11, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. All authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision is delegated to the council of the Township of Sioux Narrows-Nestor Falls with respect to all applications for land in that municipality made on or after this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 399/11, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 of this Regulation is further delegated to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 399/11, s. 2 (1). (2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 399/11, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 of this Regulation is further delegated to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 399/11, s. 2 (1).

(2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 399/11, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 399/11, s. 3. Français
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 399/11, s. 3.

Français
